block_set.description:
1. Block (aktionKontrolle)
 show picture
 write and read single matrix-LED. In row 2 and 3 a w-like picture shows up
 set LED red and green
 play tones
 No interaction is required
2. Block (tastenKontrolle)
 LED red
 press A => LED green
 release A => LED red
 repeat this at will
 press B within 1 sec after releasing A => LED off and loop terminates
 release B => LED red
 ...
